name: SURVIVOR 2048
description:
SURVIVOR 2048

Trade your life for bullets. Kill your enemies!

WASD : move
mouse : aim
left mouse click : shoot
E : interactions
left Ctrl : use adrenaline
escape : quit game

red enemy : normal
green enemy : heal
yellow enemy : block (dont lose life but can be pushed)

Enjoy :D

Rate the game here : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/survivor-2048

[Update] 05/01/2019

- added descriptions in shop

- minor UI changes

- main character and enemies can now be seen through walls for better readability

[Update] 05/02/2019

-added music and sound effects
